Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for waiting. We will
now begin the <RED>Music Festival</RED>.
<PAGE>
Let us start off by giving our 
performers a warm welcome!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please wait while the performers prepare
their instruments.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It appears that they are now ready. Let
the performance begin.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It appears that they are now ready. Let
the performance begin.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It appears that they are now ready. Let
the performance begin.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for such a wonderful
performance!
<PAGE>
It's now tea time. I hope you all
enjoyed the performance. Let's all enjoy
this fine food.
I should spend tea time with <CHARANAME0>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today's Music Festival was really fun.
I just wish they would continue their
performance during tea time.
<PAGE>
Don't you think it would be swanky to
have live performers play during tea
time? It would really liven things up.
<PAGE>
I should ask Charles to have them play
during tea time next performance. You
should come with me then, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
After enjoying some nice music under
the bright spring sun, this tea time
is the perfect way to cap it off.
<PAGE>
Speaking of which, <MYNAME>, do you
know how to play any instruments?
<PAGE>
If you want any kind of musical
instrument, just let me know. I
can make you a blueprint in a jiffy.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
By the way, <MYNAME>, you were smiling
the whole time during the performance.
<PAGE>
I saw your face and couldn't help but
smile myself, <MYNAME>. Thank you.
<PAGE>
I hope you never lose that wonderful
smile.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is fun. Listening to wonderful
music and then enjoying tea time.
<PAGE>
This is because you helped revive the
town ,<MYNAME>. Thank you so much.
<PAGE>
If I only had a grandchild as kind and
hardworking as you. I'd talk about
you to everyone every day, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's nice to have heard the performance
and then spend tea time with someone.
<PAGE>
Please come to my store sometime,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It may not be as nice as the music we
heard today, but I will definitely try
to provide you a nice time.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Phew... It's hard to even join these
festivals in my old age.
<PAGE>
Hm? You're going to massage my
shoulders?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You're very considerate! I'll show you
a bit of my research to thank you.
